entry.p: For fans of both Atlas Shrugged and the Narnian Chronicles, Aslan Shrugged is way cool. As someone said in the comments:

blockquote.p: "You got your Narnia in my Objectivism!"
"You got your Objectivism in my Narnia!"

entry.p: Two great tastes that go great together! (Thanks to Ken MacLeod for the pointer; and let's not forget that classic comic book Elvis Shrugged!)
